system.effect: The force of the blast knocks the target to the ground and leaves him senseless. The target suffers [[1d10]] Intelligence damage and is knocked Prone. He must also pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness test; if he fails, he is Stunned for 2 rounds and his Intelligence characteristic is permanently reduced by 1.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Head (Severity 4)

The force of the blast knocks the target to the ground and leaves him senseless. The target suffers [[1d10]] Intelligence damage and is knocked Prone. He must also pass a Challenging (+0) Toughness test; if he fails, he is Stunned for 2 rounds and his Intelligence characteristic is permanently reduced by 1.
